messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Wishcraft
messages.msgSnippet: Wow, thanks for recommending this.  I checked it out from the library and I can barely put it down.  It is so full of amazing insight and information that can
messages.messageBody:
Wow, thanks for recommending this. I checked it out from the library and I
can barely put it down. It is so full of amazing insight and information
that can help both me as a person with my own wishes and help me help my
children. WOW.

Joan
-----Original Message-----
From: KathrynJB@... [mailto:KathrynJB@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 2004 10:08 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Wishcraft


In a message dated 6/2/2004 7:15:39 PM Eastern Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
I have a question about the book "Wishcraft" that everyone keeps
talking about. Could you possibly tell me a little more about it?
The title itself keeps me at bay. I'm not really into the whole New
Age thing, and I'm wondering if it's that type of slant.
******************************

It's not even a little New-Agey. In fact, Barbara Sher prides herself with
her books that you don't have to be a better person, have a positive
attitude, be better educated, be better spiritually...whatever. She is
EXTREMELY practical. (Also very, very funny)

Check out her website: www.barbarasher.com
And come to see her at the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference.
Kathryn


Come to the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference August 27-29 in Peabody,
MA!
For more information, go to www.LiveandLearnConference.org

Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
ADVERTISEMENT

messages.subject: Re: Wishcraft
messages.msgSnippet: Rebecca, Thanks so much for posting this! I have been hearing about Wishcraft and wanting to read it for a long time. How wonderful that it s online! Sarah
messages.messageBody:
Rebecca,

Thanks so much for posting this! I have been hearing about Wishcraft
and wanting to read it for a long time. How wonderful that it's
online!

Sarah

messages.subject: Re: Wishcraft
messages.msgSnippet: Rebecca That is so wonderful to hear!  Thank you for sharing and encouraging me to check out this book.  I am going to for sure... Tina
messages.messageBody:
Rebecca

That is so wonderful to hear! Thank you for sharing and encouraging
me to check out this book. I am going to for sure...

Tina

messages.subject: Wishcraft
messages.msgSnippet: Tina, you can check out her book online too www.wishcraft.com it s in ebook format. I cannot even begin to explain how much this book has helped me in the past
messages.messageBody:
Tina, you can check out her book online too

www.wishcraft.com

it's in ebook format. I cannot even begin to explain how much this book has helped me in the past few weeks, Jason was smiling this morning! A true unforced smile, he hasn't yelled in a few days, he's remembering to breath and he's playing again.

I don't know where we are going yet, but I'm starting to understand what it feels like to be happy, truely happy...

~Rebecca

--
You know, Hobbes, some days even my lucky rocketship underpants don't help."
-Calvin

messages.subject: Re: Wishcraft
messages.msgSnippet: Cool, thanks!  I ll definately look into it then.  I ll add it to my list.  I think I have over 30 books out from the library right now and more to pick up
messages.messageBody:
Cool, thanks! I'll definately look into it then. I'll add it to my
list. I think I have over 30 books out from the library right now
and more to pick up tomorrow! :)

Thanks - Tina
